summary:
$SLIDER - MEET $SLIDER
AKA BURGER DUDE
$SLIDER, also known as Burger Dude, is one of Matt Furie's most popular creations. This iconic character, often referred to as Slider Boy, features prominently in various works by Furie. He can be found in the official Hedz NFT collection, Mindviscosity books, the Characters collection in Big Active, and many more. With his distinctive burger head, Slider Boy symbolizes family and community, serving as a staple in Matt Furie's imaginative world.

 TOKENOMICS - CA: COMING SOON
TAX: 0%
CA: RENOUNCED
LP: BURNT
SUPPLY: 420.69T
